item.title: 汇丰银行警告将在改革中削减高级经理职位
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）警告称，随着该银行开始进行最大规模的重组之一，将有可能裁减高级经理职位。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc warned it will likely cut senior manager jobs as the lender embarks on one of its biggest restructuring.】

item.title: 东京证券交易所员工因涉嫌内幕交易被调查
item.description: 东京证券交易所的一名员工因涉嫌内幕交易正接受日本证券监察机构的调查，这让一直带头改善公司治理的东京证券交易所感到尴尬。【原文：An employee at the Tokyo Stock Exchange is being investigated by the Japanese securities watchdog on suspicion of insider trading, an embarrassment for the organization that’s been spearheading efforts to improve corporate governance.】

item.title: 摩根大通在戴蒙大奖后再次关注液化天然气实物交易
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）在观望了十多年之后，正在商谈再次启动液化天然气实物交易，此举符合首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）关于增加国内生产和能源出口的呼吁。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is in talks to start trading physical liquefied natural gas again after more than a decade on the sidelines, a move that lines up with Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon’s calls for an increase in domestic production and energy exports.】

item.title: 印尼银行认为印尼盾可抵御近期波动
item.description: 印尼预计印尼盾将经受住金融市场波动加剧的考验，印尼央行对印尼盾的走强充满信心。【原文：Indonesia expects the rupiah to withstand rising financial market volatility, with the central bank confident it will strengthen.】

item.title: 荷兰中央银行的结呼吁撤销租金管制：荷兰国家警察
item.description: 据报道，荷兰中央银行行长克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）呼吁内阁撤销房租控制措施，因为住房价格飞涨，供应量越来越少。【原文：Dutch central bank President Klaas Knot has called on the cabinet to reverse rent control measures, according to a report, with housing prices soaring and availability dwindling.】

item.title: 大众汽车经理在泰国涉嫌吸毒后被驱逐出中国
item.description: 据当地警方和媒体报道，大众汽车公司在中国的一名高级管理人员因涉嫌吸毒而被扣留，随后被驱逐回德国。【原文：A senior Volkswagen AG executive in China was deported to Germany after being held over alleged drug use, according to local police and the media, amid souring relations with the West.】

item.title: 欧洲央行开始讨论是否需要将利率降至中性以下：路透社
item.description: 路透社援引未具名人士的话报道称，欧洲央行官员正开始讨论是否需要将利率下调至刺激经济活动的水平。【原文：European Central Bank officials are starting to debate whether interest rates will need to be lowered to a level that stimulates economic activity, Reuters reported, citing people it didn’t identify.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚计划在货币改革后实行紧缩货币政策
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚央行行长马莫-米赫雷图（Mamo E. Mihretu）表示，埃塞俄比亚将在今年余下的时间里保持高利率，以应对因外汇政策改革而引起的短暂通货膨胀。【原文：Ethiopia will keep interest rates high for the rest of the year to combat transitory inflation caused by an overhaul of its foreign exchange policy, central bank Governor Mamo E. Mihretu said.】

item.title: 现代汽车印度分公司首秀疲软后看涨呼声高涨
item.description: 在现代汽车印度有限公司（Hyundai Motor India Ltd.）周二的首次交易令人失望之后，分析师们急忙建议投资者购买该公司股票，以示支持。【原文：Analysts are rushing to recommend investors buy shares of Hyundai Motor India Ltd., a much-needed show of support after the stock’s disappointing trading debut Tuesday.】

item.title: 最高法院驳回拜朱的和解协议，为破产铺平道路
item.description: 印度最高法院推翻了允许 Byju's 与债权人清偿债务的法庭命令，将这家在线辅导机构再次推入破产程序，使其离倒闭更近了一步。【原文：India’s top court struck down a tribunal order that allowed Byju’s to settle debts with a creditor, pushing the online tutor back firmly into the insolvency process and taking it a step closer to failure.】

item.title: 美国婴儿配方奶粉诉讼案引发利洁时销售下滑
item.description: 利洁时公司（Reckitt Benckiser Plc）的销售额降幅低于预期，这对担心该公司因早产儿配方奶粉在美国遭遇诉讼的投资者来说是个有限的安慰。【原文：Reckitt Benckiser Plc sales fell less than expected, offering limited relief for investors concerned about the company battling US lawsuits over its formula for premature babies.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市在盈利高峰前保持稳定
据说奇瑞将为汽车业务香港上市挑选银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，奇瑞控股集团有限公司已选定中国国际金融有限公司、广发证券股份有限公司和华泰国际有限公司为其汽车业务部门的潜在首次公开募股工作提供服务。【原文：Chery Holding Group Co. has picked China International Capital Corp., GF Securities Co. and Huatai International Ltd. to work on a potential initial public offering of its automotive unit, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 油漆制造商阿克苏诺贝尔因需求疲软下调2024年盈利目标
item.description: 阿克苏诺贝尔公司（Akzo Nobel NV）下调了全年利润预期，因为这家欧洲最大的涂料生产商仍在努力应对成本上升和需求疲软的问题。【原文：Akzo Nobel NV cut its profit forecast for the full year as Europe’s biggest paint maker continued to grapple with rising costs and softer demand.】

item.title: 交易员铸就 12 亿美元财富，其 XTB 经纪公司业绩飙升
item.description: 当前货币交易员 Jakub Zablocki 创办 X-Trade Brokers Dom Maklerski SA 时，他所拥有的只是约 7.5 万美元的种子资本和一个好主意。【原文：When former currency trader Jakub Zablocki started X-Trade Brokers Dom Maklerski SA., all he had was seed capital of about $75,000 and a good idea.】

item.title: 汉德森银行贷款业务量增加，利润增长
item.description: 瑞典银行 Svenska Handelsbanken AB 第三季度的贷款利润好于预期，主要得益于业务量的增加。【原文：Swedish lender Svenska Handelsbanken AB delivered better than expected profit from lending in the third quarter, underpinned by higher business volumes.】

item.title: 加密货币对冲基金经理合并，努力争取养老金资金流
item.description: 加密货币对冲基金管理公司 JellyC 和 Trovio Asset Management 已经合并，以吸引养老基金等机构投资者的投资。【原文：Crypto hedge fund managers JellyC and Trovio Asset Management have merged as part of an effort to attract allocations from institutional investors such as pension funds.】

item.title: 安巴尼的 Jio 正在与安联洽谈在印度成立合资保险公司事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）控制的吉奥金融服务有限公司（Jio Financial Services Ltd.）已与安联集团（Allianz SE）就在印度建立一家保险合伙公司举行了会谈，因为这家德国公司正寻求取消在印度的两家现有合资企业。【原文：Jio Financial Services Ltd., controlled by billionaire Mukesh Ambani, has held talks with Allianz SE to set up an insurance partnership in India as the German firm seeks to scrap two existing joint ventures in the country, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 掉期交易减少，海外基金减持中国债券，股市上涨
item.description: 随着一度流行的掉期交易的吸引力逐渐减弱，股市反弹吸引了全球基金的更多关注，上个月全球基金以创纪录的最快速度抛售了中国主权债券。【原文：Global funds sold Chinese sovereign notes at the fast pace on record last month as the appeal of a once-popular swap-based trade fades and a stock market rebound draws more of their attention.】

item.title: 投资收益大增，香港交易所盈利增长 7
item.description: 由于投资收入激增，香港证券交易所第三季度利润增长了 7%。【原文：Hong Kong’s stock exchange posted a 7% gain in third-quarter profit as investment income surged.】

item.title: 欧洲无法摆脱对俄罗斯天然气的依赖
item.description:
应该承认各国之间卡夫卡式的相互依存关系，因为这种关系很可能会继续下去。【原文：

The Kafkaesque interdependence between countries should be acknowledged, because it’s likely to continue.

】

item.title: 帕萨利德斯称欧洲央行持续存在的通胀风险值得警惕
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员克里斯托多洛斯-帕萨利德斯（Christodoulos Patsalides）表示，随着通胀率接近目标，欧洲央行有进一步降低借贷成本的空间，但必须密切关注上行风险。【原文：The European Central Bank has room to lower borrowing costs further as inflation approaches its target but must pay close attention to upside risks, according to Governing Council member Christodoulos Patsalides.】

item.title: 现代汽车测试新型氢气生产技术，推动绿色发展
item.description: 现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co., Ltd.）位于佐治亚州的工厂一直在使用氢气运行其内部物流业务，这家韩国汽车制造商一直在测试利用食物残渣产生的沼气在国内生产氢燃料，这也是其围绕氢气打造可持续能源未来的努力的一部分。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co.’s plant in Georgia has been running its internal logistics operations using hydrogen and the South Korean automaker has been testing domestic production of the fuel using biogas from food scraps as part of its push to build a sustainable energy future around the gas.】

item.title: 台湾考虑放宽金融检查规则以吸引投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由于当地银行和保险公司批评台湾金融监管机构的管理不统一且过于复杂，台湾金融监管机构正在审查其部分现行规则和做法。【原文：Taiwan’s financial regulator is reviewing some of its current rules and practices amid criticism from local banks and insurers on the inconsistency and over-complication of its governance, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 华润怡宝首次上市股价上涨 14
item.description: 华润怡宝控股有限公司（China Resources Beverage Holdings Co.【原文：Shares of China Resources Beverage Holdings Co. rose more than 14% early in their trading debut in Hong Kong, showing strong response to one of Hong Kong’s biggest initial public offerings this year.】

item.title: 苹果公司蒂姆-库克访华，与部长讨论数据安全问题
item.description: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）在今年第二次访问中国期间，与一位中国高级官员讨论了投资、数据安全和云服务等问题。【原文：Apple Inc.’s Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook discussed investments, data security and cloud services with a senior Chinese official during his second trip to the nation this year.】

item.title: 印度公司为何担心回报率下降
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国股市历史性跃升不太可能在财报中找到支撑
item.description: 考虑到经济不景气和刺激政策的限制，指望企业业绩给中国股市带来新一轮上涨的投资者可能不得不在本季度之后再寻找线索。【原文：Investors counting on corporate results to give China’s stock rally a fresh leg up may have to look beyond the current quarter for clues, given an ailing economy and constraints on stimulus efforts.】

item.title: 增长放缓，高盛下调印度股市评级至中性
item.description: 高盛集团将印度股票评级从 "增持 "下调至 "中性"，原因是经济增长放缓影响了企业盈利前景。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. tactically lowered Indian equities to neutral from overweight as slowing economic growth dents the outlook for corporate earnings.】

item.title: 巴西正在商谈获得中国批准建立更多肉类工厂的事宜
item.description: 巴西农业部长卡洛斯-法瓦罗（Carlos Favaro）表示，巴西正在进行谈判，争取中国批准更多肉类工厂向亚洲国家出口。【原文：Brazil is in talks to gain Chinese approval for more meat plants to export to the Asian nation, according to Agriculture Minister Carlos Favaro.】
